content.rendered:
About Us

As the premier supplier of building materials in the metro community, exceptional customer service is our highest priority.

Our History

Established in 2009, was founded with a vision to deliver high-quality products and exceptional service to the construction industry in the construction industry. 

We quickly positioned ourselves as a leading provider of lumber, building materials, windows, doors, cabinetry, and other related products for professional builders, remodelers, and general contractors throughout the greater community. Our strategic location in Roxbury, near downtown , allows us to efficiently serve residential and commercial contractors and tradesmen in the area with quicker deliveries. For all your building needs, including new windows, patio doors, kitchen cabinets, framing, and even general contracting, is your ideal partner.

Our primary focus is on providing exceptional service. We understand the importance of accuracy and efficiency in the construction industry. Whether it’s accurate material estimates using our advanced estimating software or on-time deliveries facilitated by our fleet (including 90-foot boom trucks), ensures that our customers receive the support they need to improve their productivity and financial gain. We take pride in being more than just a supplier; we strive to be a valuable resource that helps our customers through every step of their construction project.

With a location in the heart of , our construction team can get your products to you quickly anywhere in the community. has you covered with our smooth scheduling process, experienced fleet drivers, delivery notifications, and fast in-store pick-up.

What Makes Different?

What sets apart from other construction companies is our people. The family is comprised of industry enthusiasts and veterans who take pride in providing the highest level of service to our customers while also being a resource to help customers grow their businesses.

Meet Our Team

Management Team

Led by seasoned industry experts, has comprehensive knowledge of lumber and building products that is matched by their dedication to exceptional service. Whether you’re a contractor, builder, architect, or a first-time homeowner, NEBS’ leadership team is ready to provide tailored solutions and expertise for your unique needs in the area.

The Outside Sales Team

We may work on the outside, but we have the inside track to know about the newest construction products that make your house or building shine. Let us bring our expertise and product knowledge to your next project

Lumber Yard and Warehouse Staff

Our hands may get a few splinters, but we make sure to assemble your order, load it, and get it to you on time. We pride ourselves on knowing the community like the back of our hand, and there isn’t a construction job site that we can’t get to.

Kitchen Designers

More than just a place to make food, the kitchen invites everyone to gather after a long day. Our kitchen design staff brings their expertise to every kitchen project with the goal of creating a space with warmth and comfort. Just don’t challenge them to a bake-off!

Estimating and Inside Sales

Whether it’s a question about opening an account or a concern about a product or process, we’re available. Our engaged and experienced team is to make your construction experience the best it can be.

Reception and Lumber Counter

Whether it’s a question about opening an account or a concern about a product or process, we’re available. Our engaged and experienced team is to make your construction experience the best it can be.

Delivery and Dispatch

With a keen understanding of the fast-paced construction industry, NEBS’ dedicated team ensures prompt and precise deliveries, further solidifying as a reliable partner. Explore NEBS’ comprehensive services and discover how our delivery and dispatch team streamlines the supply and offers unparalleled support to New England’s construction community.
